The Disciples of Yama are followers of Yama, a fire demon. One can be found by the entrance to the Chasm of Fire, and the other can be found in the second level of the chasm.

The disciple outside the Chasm serves as a human representative. If players try to slay the demons inside without being assigned them as a slayer task, the disciple will stop them from doing so. The disciple inside the chasm serves as comedic relief.
